case.name: test-actor-clone
case.description:
Purpose:

TBA(To Be Added)


Run Instructions:

1, cd 'dir'/clutter-xxx/tests/interactive

2, ./test-interactive test-actor-clone


Pass/Fail Criteria:

1,the test-actors should be lanched well

2,every actors moved smoothly, no garbage

3,click event should be responsed timely

4,click the hand, it should be disappeared
